text: Kirsty Mepham (born 13 August 1969) is a British equestrian. She competed in two events at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:British female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Great Britain Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:People from Tonbridge
title: Kirsty Mepham
